description: Don’t be naïve in thinking prison will be a breeze. Follow our guide to sex in prison for a better understanding of what’s in store for new inmates. The final story in this series is that of Johnny Rapid. His plan was to take on the role of ultimate prison bitch. He was left alone at first, but it wasn’t long before he caught the attention of some tough guys with big dicks, looking for fresh meat.
title: A Guide To Sex In Prison Part 4
